name: com.viture.xr
description: Unity XR plugin for VITURE devices.

samples.description: Pre-configured XR Origin prefab and input actions for VITURE hand tracking. Sets up basic hand interaction with XR Interaction Toolkit. Dependencies: • Shader Graph • XR Interaction Toolkit • XR Hands
Demonstrates how to track multiple markers and visualize them with 3D objects. Dependencies: • XR Interaction Toolkit • XR Hands • Starter Assets sample
